Text:
i noticed a  couple if minor video 1sec video corruption
this time,.. must of been to do with the mp4 source usd

all in sync  though.. the main thing
def a few re-encode issues, not good quality for archiving but watchable...the show, on the other hand, sucks ass.

it always seems to be a few cappers doing mp4

they just wont convert well.. escp around ad breaks.. they must be using the same tools
to make ts to mp4s

2hd seem the best at the moment but not always the first to have a source
